title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 190-1.1 - Coverage of order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 190-1.1 - Coverage of order

State Regulations

This order shall apply to every farm employer if, during
the preceding calendar year, the cash remuneration paid to all persons employed
on the employer's farms aggregated $3,000 or more. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
190-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
